Low-Code Recipes

For a non-technical founder the mix of code and no-code can be a challenge. Here are some approaches to demystify the decision making processes.

Databases For Rapid Solutions

Which database to start with is a key decision, as it impacts the technology you can select, the pattern of storage and the frameworks that work the best. read more...

Low Friction Hosting Processes

Don't over thinking your hosting. No need to jump to EC2 or CloudFront. read more...

Slack Power Patterns

Most people look past the value of slack in building solutions. Don't. read more...

Turn-key Deployment Options

Deployment is a late stage development process that should be included from inceptions of a project. read more...

What is Low-Code?

No-code has been around a while, and its maturing fast. But it has problems. SAS vendor lock-in concerns, scalability and supportability. read more...
The CEO Perspective

These articles are written to give CEOs and Founders with a non-technical perspective on decisions that are often left to developers to address. Look for these panels to understand the impact.
